products.title: Deep Red Fabric Texture
products.description: A close-up image of a deep red fabric with a soft, smooth texture. The material appears slightly folded, creating gentle shadows and a rich tonal gradient.

products.title: Red Floral Statement Earring
products.description: A bold statement earring shaped like a red flower with layered petals and faceted red bead accents in the center. The earring is shown on a display model’s ear, highlighting its large, elegant design and subtle gold detailing.

products.title: Burgundy Teddy Bear Bag Charm
products.description: A plush burgundy teddy bear keychain attached to a black pebbled handbag. The bear features a large satin bow in matching burgundy and small gem-like accents on the ears, adding a cute and stylish accessory touch.

products.title: Two-Pack Neutral Ankle Socks
products.description: A pair of ankle-length socks in two neutral colors: light beige and deep brown. The socks have a ribbed texture around the ankle and smooth knit construction, each printed with the ‘ALDO’ branding near the toe.

products.title: Beige Knit Fabric Close-Up
products.description: A detailed close-up image of a beige knit material, showing its fine woven texture and soft, neutral color. Perfect for highlighting fabric quality or textile patterns.
